name: Manual Trigger
description: Runs the flow on clicking a button in w8w

properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this manual trigger

properties.name: description
properties.description: Additional details explaining when or why this trigger is used

name: Timer Node
description: Waits for the given time until to proceed further

properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this timer node

properties.name: description
properties.description: Explanation of why this delay is added to the workflow

properties.name: delay
properties.description: Time to wait before proceeding to the next step (in milliseconds)

name: Webhook
description: Starts the workflow when a webhook is called

properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this webhook trigger

properties.name: description
properties.description: Explanation of what event or system triggers this webhook

properties.name: httpMethod
properties.description: HTTP method that the webhook endpoint will accept

properties.name: baseUrl
properties.description: Auto-generated webhook URL path used to receive requests

name: Form
description: Initiates workflow execution upon form submission

properties.name: name
properties.description: Title of the form shown to users

properties.name: description
properties.description: Short explanation displayed to users before submitting the form
properties.placeholder: Please fill in the details below

properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this VPAAS action

properties.name: description
properties.description: Additional details about this call automation step

properties.name: to
properties.description: Destination phone number that will receive the call

properties.name: callbackUrl
properties.description: Webhook URL to receive call events such as ringing or answered

properties.name: mainHangupUrl
properties.description: Webhook URL triggered when the call ends

properties.name: recordSession
properties.description: Enable or disable call recording for this session

properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this email action

properties.name: description
properties.description: Additional context about the email being sent

properties.name: to
properties.description: Recipient email address

properties.name: subject
properties.description: Subject line of the email

properties.name: message
properties.description: Body content of the email

properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this Telegram message action

properties.name: description
properties.description: Additional context about the Telegram message

properties.name: chatId
properties.description: Telegram chat ID where the message will be sent

properties.name: text
properties.description: Message content to send via Telegram

name: Send SMS
description: Sends a SMS via Twilio SMS service

properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this SMS action

properties.name: description
properties.description: Additional context about the SMS being sent

properties.name: From
properties.description: Sender phone number registered with Twilio

properties.name: to
properties.description: Recipient phone number
